metadata.title: CVE-2022-21797 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The package joblib from 0 and before 1.2.0 are vulnerable to Arbitrary CodeExecution via the pre_dispatch flag in Parallel() class due to the eval()statement.

criterions.comment: joblib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
